description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Dokee the Dog create cool music by catching falling instruments from the sky. Expand babies and children's creativity. It is more fun when a more skilled kid or an adult uses a second gamepad to play cooperatively.
